It's portal,, Of course its reccomended
Portal 2 is one of the best games I had the opportunity to play ever. Logical puzzles and co-op multiplayer makes it more enjoyable. This game is a Must-Have. 10/10
Good story, funny, good puzzles. Very good.

Replaying it in 2022, I have realised just how S O Y all of the writing is. Similar vibes to Big Bang theory. 

Still good.

One of the most enjoyable video games I have ever played I was surprised on how good this game was I even knew the entire story and was entertained throughout I can not recommend this game enough just buy it already.
One of my favorite games of all time!

Its a Absolutly Phenomenal game, great gameplay, great story and excellent humour! It can be more than just recommended, likely a must too because its way beyond great and prefect execution. But its also recommended to play first Portal 1 then 2 since in Portal 2 the difficulty gets raised pretty early and Portal 1 is very good to get used to the Portal gun and the first mechanics, get deeper into the story and of course learn from it!
for a game that has been in my life for almost 10 years and that i've replayed almost yearly, i never get over the part where he kills you
I LOVE THIS GAME IF OYU LIKE PUZZLE GAMES GET THIS GAME BUT PLAY PORTAL 1 FIRST BECAUSE OF THE AMAZING STORY
i really like the part where i killed my friend
a lot more content than the first portal
Very good game I've played through it more than 20 times and I still love the game.
BEST GAME IN THE UNIVERSE NOTHING BEATS IT

"homie i had to make it out of the trenches"
the trenches in question:
Very good game! Great dose of humor from Wheatly and Glados duo

great game, you know the drill its frickin portal 2 what else do I need to say.
this game taught me to never trust british people and that girlbossing will always win
It is a puzzle game not a shooter, tho you do get shot at and can die. Mostly there is no time element except at the end.
very good u better play best gameplay ever I love it

spinning every 3rd time i start game

edit: it stopped

Ah Portal 2. As if the first game wasn't enough they made a sequel and somehow improved! I've had a blast playing this and the coop. I even dabbled in the custom map making, though I was severely limited by my creativity (or lack thereof). It's an amazing game even to this day and is a must play for anyone who can spare the ¬£7.19 required to play this masterpiece of creation.
it's just a lovely puzzle game and with a very interesting plot that you get invested in quickly. It's especially fun in multiplayer!

Absolutely classic game that is fun, clever, and rewarding. 

10/10 would put Glados in a potato again :)
its a amazing game been playing sense i got it on the xbox 360
Portal 1 if it was a PG-13 sci fi horror movie
Great game, provides hours of play.
A good puzzle game with physics and a good story but i think you have to play portal 1 to understand story idk i didn't play it
literally one of the best game i have ever played, I love it makes me think and it overall really good. the ending is really good as well one of the best in my opinion

it is very fun i love it i have played for 129 hours its that fun

Portal 2 is an amazing and fun puzzle game with a great story and allot of repeatability. With the addition of steam workshop being compatible with this game, playing others levels make the game more fun with more things to do as well as the modding community is great at adding more to this game. the test chamber creator is also a really nice addition to the already wonderful game giving you access to relax and also challenge your friends or foes to see who can make the hardest chamber or just relax and make whatever comes to your mind!
so much fun + you turn the robot into a potato in portal 2

robot lady turned into a potato and trapped a dumb funny british robot into space


10/10
The story is solid, funny and emotional. The co-op part is fun with friends(which I don't have) and if you finish it, you can continue with the community created levels. Great game!
unfortunately this game requires the use of the human brain in order to solve diffucult puzzles and i had to search youtube tutorials in order to do about 2 puzzles, overall game gud.
game is epic and its fun
best puzzle game to ever bless this plane of existance.
Its good it makes you think out of the box and inside the box sometimes.it is just better then the first game
I got this game just to play the co-op and its so fun. Recommend

It was an amazing game, with witty humor and wonderful puzzles. The challenge mode and the player created maps add a wonderful icing on the portal cake.
